description: Prime numbers in order of their appearance in A051686.
comments: A051686 includes the minimal 2k-Germain primes, which show a special order of emergence as 2k increases. This sequence shows this order. Remark that each prime seems to appear several times.
example: 37 appears first in A051686 at the 148th position and it is the 7th new prime number which arises, sooner than smaller primes like 11,31,29,17,23 so a[7]=37
author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 14 1999
